Done. Thanks for suggestion!

These look good to me although I'd suggest renaming `univ_val_map_subtype` to `univ_val_map_subtype_val` and `univ_val_map_subtype_val` to `univ_val_map_subtype_restrict`.
These look good to me although I'd suggest renaming `univ_val_map_subtype` to `univ_val_map_subtype_val` and `univ_val_map_subtype_val` to `univ_val_map_subtype_restrict`.
maintainer merge

```suggestion
    univ.val.map (Subtype.restrict p f) = (univ.filter p).val.map f := by
```
I think this is the more canonical spelling?
It is all right; I just had to switch to "full" `rfl`. Thanks for the better spelling!

```suggestion
  rw [← univ_val_map_subtype_val, Multiset.map_map, Subtype.restrict_def]
```
